p: The statistical analysis will consider the safety set (SAF), full analysis set (FAS), and per‚Äêprotocol set (PPS) patient populations (Table 3). The primary endpoint analysis will be conducted for the FAS and PPS, the secondary endpoints will be evaluated in the FAS and in the PPS (in case the 2 populations differ by >5%), and the safety analysis will be conducted in the SAF. All efficacy and safety analyses will be summarised using descriptive statistics.
